Package test

Class EmailFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.EmailFileReader
  • public class EmailFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides 4 utility methods to be used when preparing training and receive data in unit tests.
    Author:
    Chami

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmailFileReader

        public EmailFileReader()

    • Method Detail

      • readTrainingFile

        public static int readTrainingFile​(java.lang.String filename,
                                   Email[] emails,
                                   boolean[] isSpam)
        This method reads a training data file into an array of Emails and an array of booleans. Training data files are formatted as 3 line entries in the following manner: <0 or 1 to represent spam or not>
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path to the training data file
        emails - an empty array of Emails to load from the training data
        isSpam - an empty array of booleans to load from the training data PRE-CONDITION: emails and isSpam have enough space to store all the entries in the data file Reminder: isSpam[i] = true/false means emails[i] is a spam/safe email
        Returns:
        the number of entries that were actually read This will be used by the downsize() methods to create Email and boolean arrays of the proper sizes to be used by SpamFilter.

      • readReceivedEmails

        public static int readReceivedEmails​(java.lang.String filename,
                                     Email[] emails)
        This method reads a receive data file into an array of Emails. Receive data files are formatted as 2 line entries in the following manner:
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path to the training data file
        emails - an empty array of Emails to load from the training data PRE-CONDITION: emails has enough space to store all the entries in the data file
        Returns:
        the number of entries that were actually read This will be used by the downsize() method to create Email arrays of the proper size to be used by SpamFilter.

      • downsize

        public static Email[] downsize​(Email[] a,
                               int size)
        Resizes an Email array down to a provided size. This is used to resize the results of the file-reading methods above into a proper Email array to be used by the SpamFilter train(), receive() methods.
        Parameters:
        a - an array of Email objects
        size - a size to resize down to PRE-CONDITION: size is <= a.length
        Returns:
        the downsized array of length size

      • downsize

        public static boolean[] downsize​(boolean[] a,
                                 int size)
        Resizes a boolean array down to a provided size. This is used to resize the results of the file-reading methods above into a proper boolean array to be used by the SpamFilter train() method
        Parameters:
        a - an array of booleans
        size - a size to resize down to PRE-CONDITION: size is <= a.length
        Returns:
        the downsized array of length size
